name: gallery001
description:
gallery001 is a virtual art gallery in a nonexistent museum.

Interactive artworks allow for experiences not possible in real museums. The art in the gallery closely relates to the artist's life. Feel free to explore and touch the art.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

gallery001 was created for my senior capstone project at UT Dallas. The project was executed over the course of 3 1/2 months with modeling, texturing, programming, etc. all completed by me (unless credited otherwise).

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

For PC and Xbox Controllers:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

E/Space/Left Click - Interact

Esc - Pause/Cancel

Left Thumbstick - Movement

Right Thumbstick - Look

A - Interact

Start - Pause
